article: At 8:30 pm I finished closing up my cafe. I had been busy all day long, so I was eager to get home to have a _ . A car pulled into the car park, and a woman and four youths got out. The woman looked quite _ . She told me that while she was _ home on an unfamiliar country road, her car had slipped off the road. _ , she was unhurt. The youths gave her a _ and brought her to where she'd be able to make a _ . She telephoned her husband, who was looking after their baby. So she _ to call a tow truck . She was about 100km from home and hoped that her car would be _ once it was pulled out. I knew it was going to cost her a fortune to get a tow truck, _ I phoned my husband. He _ and said he would arrive soon.  The three of us headed off up the 51 _ in search of the car. It took nearly an hour to _ it. Later, after a few failed _ to move the car and the same number of _ ropes, my husband went to a rural fire brigade officer's house and _ their towing rope.  Back at the scene, through lots of efforts, it came _ . My husband drove the car back to our place and made sure it was _ to drive. Then she phoned her husband to _ him she was on her way home. She was very thankful, and tried to _ us. But we refused for it hadn't cost us anything but _ . We felt so pleased at what we had done.
